= Data =

== Data Model ==

  * ID: Identifier
  * STREET: String
  * HOUSE_NUMBER: String
  * ADDRESS_EXTENSION: String
  * POSTAL_CODE: String
  * CITY: String
  * LATITUDE: Number
  * LONGITUDE: Number
  * GEOMETRY: Point Geom
  * ORIGIN: String
  * REFERENCE_URL: "http://www.openaddresses.org"
  * DATE_CREATED: Date
  * DATE_MODIFIED: Date
  * DATE_DELETED: Date

== Open Points ==

Addresses can also be captured as ranges, represented as lines.
